Home » 40P17 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
6 Kusalattika, Pītittika
Kusalattika, Pītittika
18.
44Kusalaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate terasa.
45Kusalaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate terasa.
46Kusalaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate terasa.
